title: And Then There Were None - Agatha Christie
description:
1 x 90 mins

One of Agatha Christie's best known books (which when I was a teenager still had the original, non PC title of "Ten Little N******s)

For anybody not familiar with the story, 8 strangers are lured to an island off the Devon coast, where they are met by a housekeeper and his wife (this is Christie in the 1930s remember!) After dinner on the first evening, they play a record which accuses all ten of them of being responsible for the death of another, for which they have gone unpunished. Vengeance will follow and the body count starts to rise......

The usual highly polished BBC standard
